formData:
{"Client":"Visteon","Vendor":"Willis Tower Watson","Version":"1.0","Doc Owner":"Shubman Gill","Functional Lead":"Rohit Sharma","Status":"DRAFT","Last updated by":"Shubman Gill","Last date updated":"2025-05-23","Mode of Integration":"API - BASED","File Format":".csv","Integration Approach":"SFTP
Host: ftp.ehr.com
Protocol: SFTP
Port: 22
Path:
UserName: eepoint-Visteon","Employee Selection Criteria":"All Active Employees"}
businessUseCase: It is for Visteon to uitilize their own insurance module. For that they need the Org Data.
businessLogic: This is an outbound integration. Take our org data and send through SFTP to Visteon on their SFTP thing. Weekly uploads of active employees. Follow the data mapping table.
